Search For Flight
For
Passengers
{{flight}}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-search-flights', templateUrl: './search-flights.component.html', styleUrls: ['./search-flights.component.css'] }) export class SearchFlightsComponent implements OnInit { searchResult: any = ["American Airlines","British Airline","Egyptian Airline"]; constructor() { } ngOnInit(): void { } }
